gold.user: User A requests to retrieve all contexts for a custom field with ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of contexts associated with the specified field.

gold.user: User B wants to create a new context for the custom field with ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Creates a new context for the specified field and returns the created context details.

gold.user: User C is looking to get the default values for the custom field with ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Returns the default values set for the specified field.

gold.user: User D wants to update the default values for the custom field with ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Updates the default values for the specified field and confirms the update.

gold.user: User E requests to see the issue type mappings for contexts of field ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Returns the issue type mappings associated with the specified field contexts.

gold.user: User F is trying to find custom field contexts for specific projects and issue types.
gold.ideal: Returns the contexts for the specified projects and issue types.

gold.user: User G wants to retrieve the project mapping for the custom field with ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Returns the project mapping details for the specified field.

gold.user: User H intends to delete the context with ID 1 for the custom field with ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified context and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: User I wants to update the context with ID 1 for the custom field with ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified context and returns the updated context details.

gold.user: User J is adding issue types to the context with ID 1 for field ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Adds the specified issue types to the context and confirms the addition.

gold.user: User K wants to remove certain issue types from the context with ID 1 for field ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Removes the specified issue types from the context and confirms the removal.

gold.user: User L is assigning projects to the context with ID 1 for field ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Assigns the specified projects to the context and confirms the assignment.

gold.user: User M wants to remove the context with ID 1 from certain projects for field ID 10000.
gold.ideal: Removes the specified context from the projects and confirms the removal.
